content.rendered:
It’s late. But I’m up and by brain is, for various reasons, unusually not caffeine-related, buzzing. Partly because I’m really thankful this evening.

Thankful because, both online and off, I’m part of some amazing communities of people who inspire and encourage one another.

Thankful because I’ve had support and encouragement of my own from friends, family, and people who weren’t friends but who now most definitely are.

Thankful that I’m able to pass on the things that I’ve learned to others so that they can be blessed as I have been.

Giving and receiving are part of any community and family. May we be generous in our giving and gracious in our receiving.

Grace.

There’s that word again.

It keeps coming up.

Grace.

Hmm…
